experience.title: Customer Experience Specialist

experience.title: Customer Care Professional
experience.description: • Handled 50+ emails and cases daily which helped in improving the average response time per email resulting in increased agent satisfaction and resolution rating by customers• Mentored a team of 10 agents wherein monitored and evaluated their work and helped them improve productivity as a result of which the company got new businesses from the client.• Managed and prepared the performance reports of the incubation team members and provided the findings and recommendations helping the team members in improving productivity• Communicated with the client and internal backend team based in Ireland and shared the insights about the team performance and discussed ways to improve and excel
